    • Method Detail

      • withKey

        public StoreOperation.Builder withKey(BinaryValue key)
        Set the key for this StoreOperation.

        If not set or null, a key is generated by Riak and returned in the response.

        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withBucketType

        public StoreOperation.Builder withBucketType(BinaryValue bucketType)
        Set the bucket type for the StoreOperation. If not set, "default" is used.
        Parameters:
        bucketType - the bucket type
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

        Parameters:

      • withReturnHead

        public StoreOperation.Builder withReturnHead(boolean returnHead)
        Return the metadata after storing the value.

        Causes Riak to only return the metadata for the object. The value will be set to null.

        Parameters:
        returnHead - true to return only metadata.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withIfNotModified

        public StoreOperation.Builder withIfNotModified(boolean ifNotModified)
        Set the if_not_modified flag for this StoreOperation.

        Setting this to true means to update the value only if the vclock in the supplied object matches the one in the database.

        Be aware there are several cases where this may not actually happen. Use of this feature is discouraged.

        Parameters:
        ifNotModified -
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withIfNoneMatch

        public StoreOperation.Builder withIfNoneMatch(boolean ifNoneMatch)
        Set the if_none_match flag value for this StoreOperation.

        Setting this to true means store the value only if this bucket/key combination are not already defined.

        Be aware that there are several cases where this may not actually happen. Use of this option is discouraged.

        Parameters:
        ifNoneMatch - the if_non-match value.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withAsis

        public StoreOperation.Builder withAsis(boolean asis)
        Set the asis value for this operation.

        Do not use this unless you understand the ramifications

        Parameters:
        asis - the asis value
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withTimeout

        public StoreOperation.Builder withTimeout(int timeout)
        Set a timeout for this operation.
        Parameters:
        timeout - a timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

        public StoreOperation.Builder withNVal(int nval)
